attributes.action: introduce a bill before Parliament to make it an offence for people under the legal age to buy or attempt to buy alcohol or tobacco products.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe it is necessary to make it that not only should it be illegal to sell alcohol and tobacco to young people, but that it should also be an offence for young people to attempt to purchase these items (and other age limited goods such as matches, petrol & fireworks.)  This might bring home to some young people the dangers of these goods, and may assist in the reduction of under-age users of these harmful/dangerous products.
An exemption would be made for children assisting the police/consumer protection officers in 'agent provocateur' operations.
